forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain will fall throughout the day. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High near 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
